text: Ara emana lokadera jan'ya kona ksama ne'i, yara manda kaja karate'i thake, emana ki yakhana tadera karo mathara upara mrtyu upasthita haya, takhana balate thakeh ami ekhana ta'oba karachi. Ara ta'oba ne'i tadera jan'ya, yara kuphari abasthaya mrtyubarana kare. Ami tadera jan'ya yantranadayaka sasti prastuta kare rekhechi.
